description: This file defines a UI component named 'NotesList' for a notes application, built using Lightning JS framework. It manages displaying a list of notes, subscribing to note updates, and handling user interactions such as adding, selecting, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A Lightning JS component that displays a list of notes, allows selection, addition, and deletion of notes, and subscribes to real-time updates.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note item or 'Untitled' if not available.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Formats the note's updated timestamp into a locale string.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on whether it is selected.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position of a note item in the list.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Returns the background color for trash icon hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state over delete icon.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave from delete icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover over the add new note button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave from the add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Emits selection of a note, updating internal state and calling external callback if provided.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Selects a note by its ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Deletes a note after confirmation and updates selection.
